alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Simpson, Lincoln, Lawrence, southern Copiah and Jefferson Davis Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1030 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Magee to near Barlow. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pleasant Hill and Clem around 1045 PM CDT. Caseyville around 1050 PM CDT. Loyd Star around 1100 PM CDT. Brookhaven and Vaughn around 1105 PM CDT. West Lincoln around 1110 PM CDT. Melba around 1115 PM CDT. Enterprise, Bogue Chitto and Center Point around 1120 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include New Hebron, Silver Creek, Bassfield and Beauregard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Copiah; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson
